content: this legal document from the patti court dated october 1 2021 states that a final resolution has been reached after several years the court ruled on a case involving multiple parties the plaintiffs claim to nullify certain property sale deeds was dismissed and they were ordered to pay the litigation costs to the defendants however the court granted the plaintiffs request to establish their status as coheirs and recover their share of the property the defendant was also ordered to pay the plaintiffs the value of the share that was alienated the court divided the litigation costs between the plaintiffs and the defendant and the defendant was further ordered to pay the costs of the courtappointed technical expertise
